heading: HR01711
0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES ON THE FILING OF PLUNDER AND DIRECT BRIBERY CASES AGAINST INVOLVED OFFICIALS IN THE JACK LAM BRIBERY SCANDAL INCLUDING FORMER BUREAU OF IMMIGRATION COMMISSIONERS AL ARGOSINO AND MICHAEL ROBLES AND RETIRED POLICE OFFICER WENCESLAO "WALLY" SOMBERO JR.
